hero.name: Jawad Yazbek
hero.description: A passionate developer building modern web experiences with focus on performance, scalability, and user experience.

about.title: About Me
about.p1: I'm a full-stack developer with a passion for building digital products that solve real-world problems. With a strong foundation in both frontend and backend technologies, I strive to create seamless user experiences.
about.p2: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing my knowledge with the developer community.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: Here are some of my recent projects that showcase my skills and experience.

rustlink.title: RustLink
rustlink.description: An unofficial RUST+ alternative for PC. Interactive map experience using websocket protocol to communicate with Rust game servers.

abbas.title: Abbas Center
abbas.description: A professional web platform developed for the Abbas Center organization, providing community resources and information.

sandok.title: Sandok Taadod
sandok.description: A specialized local networked platform for cooperative fund management and community financial tracking.

optical.title: Optical Clinic
optical.description: A comprehensive management system for optical clinics, featuring patient records, appointments, and prescriptions.

portfolio.title: Jawad.dev Portfolio
portfolio.description: My personal portfolio website built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion. Featuring multi-language support (English/Arabic) and a fully responsive RTL/LTR layout.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!

footer.builtWith: Built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion.
